document.text:
From: 
To: 
• 
Subject: Fwd: gloria allred purchases prince andrew 'wanted' poster 
Date: Fri, 21 Feb 2020 14:04:38 +0000 
Inline-Images: image001.jpg 
Sent from my iPhone 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: "Katersky, Aaron" 
<Aaron.Katerskv(a abc.com>
Date: February 21, 2020 at 9:00:21 AM EST 
To:" 
Subject: FW: gloria allred purchases prince andrew 'wanted' poster 
Attorney Gloria Allred said she placed an ad on a  school bus that circled Buckingham Palace this morning, calling for him 
to talk to the FBI about the Jeffrey Epstein case. 
The bus carried a large picture of the prince accompanied by the message -- "If you see this man please ask him to call 
the FBI to answer their questions." 
Allred just discussed her stunt outside criminal court in Lower Manhattan, where she is attending the Harvey Weinstein 
trial. 
Allred who represents some of Epstein's victims. 
Allred displayed a photo of the bus on her computer and a photo from the Press Association is below 
The message on the bus was from US lawyer Gloria Allred. Photograph: Stefan Rousseau/PA 
EFTA00026869
